prTitle: feat: create CSS reset and custom properties foundation
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented the CSS foundation for the donkey website project by creating a comprehensive CSS reset and custom properties system. This establishes the base styles and design tokens needed for consistent styling across the application.

### Changes Made

#### CSS Reset (`src/styles/base/reset.css`)
- ✅ Box-sizing reset (border-box model for all elements)
- ✅ Margin and padding normalization
- ✅ Sensible defaults for typography, forms, and media elements
- ✅ Accessibility utilities (sr-only, skip-link classes)
- ✅ Respects user preferences for reduced motion
- ✅ Modern CSS reset following best practices

#### CSS Custom Properties (`src/styles/base/variables.css`)
- ✅ Complete color system with primary (donkey brown theme), neutrals, grays, and semantic colors
- ✅ Typography system with fluid font sizes, font families, weights, line heights
- ✅ Spacing scale with consistent units (rem-based) and semantic aliases
- ✅ Layout values for containers, breakpoints, header/footer dimensions
- ✅ Border radius, shadows, and z-index scales
- ✅ Animation and transition design tokens
- ✅ Follows naming convention (--color-*, --spacing-*, --font-*, etc.)
- ✅ Supports light mode design tokens as specified

### Technical Details

- **Mobile-first approach**: Fluid typography using `clamp()` for responsive scaling
- **Accessibility**: Screen reader utilities and focus management
- **Performance**: CSS custom properties for efficient style updates
- **Maintainability**: Comprehensive commenting and logical organization
- **Browser support**: Modern CSS features with sensible fallbacks

### File Structure Created
```
src/styles/base/
├── reset.css      # CSS reset and normalization
└── variables.css  # CSS custom properties (design tokens)
```

Closes #9
